dc_description_s: Cover title: Indexed map of Michigan. Index title page: Page's indexed township map of Michigan, showing location of all railroad stations, post-offices, and villages in the state. Insets at same scale: Isle Royale -- [west part of the Upper Peninsula]. 1 map: col.; 62 x 41 cm., folded in cover 16 x 9 cm.  index (11 p.; 15 cm.) This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
